comments: Really did enjoy this class! Best teacher. He\'s a professor that looks just like Bernie Sanders and cracks jokes with the class. Helpful professor and always interested in student\'s lives.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Dr. Stacy\'s Intro into Public Health class is a piece in not only interesting but fairly easy as well. He\'s pretty generous with grading and as long as you he knows you\'re putting effort into the class and show up regularly you\'ll be okay!

tag_professor: Respected (4)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: RESPECTED  GROUP PROJECTS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: If you like knowing what you\'re going to talk about when you go to class each day and having clear and specific expectations from your teacher on assignments, Dr. Stacy may take some getting used to. However as long as you put some effort in, you\'re likely to get full credit on your assignments, and his lectures are always interesting. Good class

tag_professor: Respected (4)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  RESPECTED  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Dr. Stacy maybe a man with white hair.. but he knows what he is doing. He will grade you fairly. There are usually 3 exams in all the classes he teaches. He provides a study guide. Use it and memorize it. He is not a big believer of "trick questions". He also loves great presentations, there are always presentations for his class.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I have taken several health education courses with Dr. Stacy. He is my favorite professor at UNO!

tag_professor: Respected (4)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: PROFESSOR STACY IS VERY HELPFUL AND VERY INTERESTED IN STUDENTS EDUCATION! HE IS VERY FRIENDLY AND HELPFUL AND WORKS WITH ALL HIS STUDENTS TO MAKE SURE THEY KNOW WHAT THEY ARE DOING! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND TAKING A CLASS WITH HIM!!

tag_professor: Respected (4)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Richard Stacy is by far the worst professor at UNO! All his classes are the same and to attend his class is like torture! You take his class you will learn nothing and waste valuable time and money! He needs to retire and get out of teaching because he is way past his prime. UNO would be a much better school with some new blood and new ideas.
